data.name: HORROR TALES: The Beggar
data.detailed_description:
• An evil imaginary friend: After 100 years locked in your cell you developed an evil friend and now that you are free he won’t stop hunting you so you return to your cell.

  • Unreal Engine 5: Thanks to the power of Unreal Engine 5, you will find state of the art visuals, rendering and AI in The Beggar.

  • Intense Boss Battles: Fight in Epic Boss battles that will challenge your skills in epic environments with dynamic weather and day/night system.

  • Control the earth: Use your powers to change from day to night or flood the environment with awesome thunderstorms. Use this wisely and you will be able to progress through the story

  • An Epic Tale: immerse yourself in a tale that will take you around many places around the world to save your brother from the dangers inhabiting the four towers.


Absorbed in his thoughts, an old man was wandering through Barcelona on June 7, 1926. A streetcar ran over him. Taken by a beggar, he was taken to the Santa Creu hospital, where the homeless were taken.

Three days later he died in a small, dreary room. The famous Catalan architect Antoni Gaudí had passed away.

80 years later, you were born. On your ninth birthday you were locked in a cell. The first year you were locked up, you forgot the faces of your friends. The fourth, the sun. At 92 years in captivity you forgot who you are and why you were locked up. Then you stopped counting.

Time has rusted the lock on the door of your cell and you are about to open it. You remember only one thing: the corpse outside the cell belonged to your mother.

There is a note on the wall.

HORROR TALES SAGA

data.short_description: Explore a post-apocalyptic shattered earth with your evil imaginary friend! Immerse yourself in seemingly abandoned landscapes and rescue your brother from the four towers. But be aware; you and your friend are not alone.
